octeon_bufpool_config_t Struct Reference

#include <buffer_pool.h>

Detailed Description

Configuration for the driver's buffer pool.

Indicates the numbers of buffers to allocate at init time for each pool.

Definition at line 48 of file buffer_pool.h.
